short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to export X/Twitter followers and following list to CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape X/Twitter Followers and Following of any public profile, Save X/Twitter following list to CSV / Excel / JSON.

HOW TO USE?
1. Enter a X/Twitter username
2. Select export type (followers or following)
3. Click the start button
